actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on International Relations.

official_title: Expressing the gratitude of the House of Representatives to the people and Government of Malaysia for their support, cooperation, and assistance in combating international terrorism.

summary.text: Expresses the friendship of the House of Representatives with the citizens of Malaysia and its deep appreciation and gratitude to the Government of Malaysia for their support, cooperation, and assistance in combating international terrorism.

titles.title: Expressing the gratitude of the House of Representatives to the people and Government of Malaysia for their support, cooperation, and assistance in combating international terrorism.
